mapper.insert: insert into hz_teaching_comment (id, course_id, test_id, class_id, user_id, difficulty, `completion`, knowledge_quantity, test_design, description, create_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{courseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{testId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{classId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{difficulty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{completion,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{knowledgeQuantity,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{testDesign,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.select: select id, course_id, test_id, class_id, user_id, difficulty, `completion`, knowledge_quantity, test_design, description, create_time from hz_teaching_comment where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
